data.title: Ultimate Eurovision Justice: The 2000’s!
data.meta_description:
In 2020, Popjustice rated their favorite Eurovision songs from 2010-2019. Now, let’s take the time machine back to the decade prior.



There were many...
data.text:
In 2020, Popjustice rated their favorite Eurovision songs from 2010-2019. Now, let’s take the time machine back to the decade prior.

There were many highlights in Eurovision from 2000 to 2009: the majority of the contests were won by countries which had never won before; the semi-final format was re-introduced, one at first and eventually two; and the Contest truly became a global event as it was broadcast over the Internet.

Please send me a private message ranking your 25 favorite Eurovision songs from 2000-2009. Your top ranked song will earn 25 points, your 25th ranked song will earn 1 point.

In case you need a reminder, here are your competitors:

Votes are due to me by January 3, 2023 at 11:59pm in the last time zone.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

BONUS!

Either with your votes, or at another time, please consider submitting nominations for these awards (which have no bearing on the main vote):

1. Biggest Robbery (i.e. something that didn’t happen, but should have)

2. Biggest Disappointment (i.e. something that did happen, but shouldn’t have)

3. Best Costume/Ensemble

4. Worst Costume/Ensemble

5. Best Staging

6. Worst Staging

These should each be one year, referring to the physical design of the actual stage, backdrops, lighting etc. This is just about the production of the overall show and not the acts.

7. Best Presenter/Team

8. Worst Presenter/Team

9. Best Interval Act

10. Worst Interval Act

11. Contestant That You Want To Take To Pound Town and/or That You Want Them To Take You To Pound Town (Or Hold Hands With Or Just Stare Lovingly Into Their Eyes)

12. Best Show

13. Worst Show

These should be each be one specific performance, referring to their choreography, props, performer antics, etc.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Also, feel free to post any relevant stories in this thread (did you attend one of the shows? do you know one of the performers? those sorts of things)

Happy voting!​
